meanings.definition: Capable of being sounded or measured.
meanings.sent1: The new material was soundable, allowing scientists to accurately gauge its thickness.
meanings.sent2: The ruler is a soundable tool for measuring length.
meanings.sent3: The soundable wall clock made it easy for the children to learn how to tell time.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a soundable indicator of her emotions, always revealing her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The soundable beeping of the alarm clock woke him up every morning.
